spell.name: Mass Healing Word (UA)
spell.text: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on Constructs or Undead.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 4 or higher, the healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 3.
Source: Unearthed Arcana: Player's Handbook Playtest 8 p. 20
